title: Jeremy Corbyn allies lash out over Remainer threat to deselect Labour MPs who back Brexit deal
text:
Labour descended into a fierce row over Boris Johnson’s Brexit deal as senior party figures threatened to deselect MPs if they voted with the Government.

Allies of Jeremy Corbyn hit out at Jon Lansman, the Momentum founder, after he claimed Labour’s ruling body would block any MP who voted for the deal from standing at the next election.

Mr Lansman was joined by John McDonnell, the shadow chancellor, who warned there would be “consequences” and refused to rule out the whip being removed from rebels.

It came as two more Labour MPs, Melanie Onn and Sarah Champion, confirmed they intended to vote for the deal, taking the number expected to back it to 11. The pair, who represent the northern Leave...
description: Labour descended into a fierce row over Boris Johnson’s Brexit deal as senior party figures threatened to deselect MPs if they voted with the Government.
